name: SerumAlbumin
title: Serum Albumin
purpose: (Clinical Focus: This set of values identifies lab tests commonly used for a  serum or plasma albumin test.),(Data Element Scope: The intent of this data element is to identify patients with a lab test performed on a source of serum or plasma for albumin. Using the Quality Data Model, this particular element would map to the Laboratory Test category.),(Inclusion Criteria: Include LOINC Albumin lab tests using the source of serum or plasma with a reporting scale of mass per volume or moles per volume.),(Exclusion Criteria: Exclude codes for challenge tests.)
